Re: Jeffrey Epstein 19 cr 490
From James Petrucci
To [redacted]
Date 2019/08/14 17:44
Subject: Re: Jeffrey Epstein 19 cr 490
Attachments: TEXT.htm
Thanks [redacted]
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
------- Original message -------
From: [redacted] @bop.gov>
Date: 8/14/19 17:29 (GMT-05:00)
To: Lee Plourde [redacted] @bop.gov>, James Petrucci [redacted] @bop.gov>
Subject: Fwd: Jeffrey Epstein 19 cr 490
[redacted] 08/14/2019 17:29 >>>
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
------- Original message -------
From [redacted] @bop.gov>
Date: 8/12/19 2:44 PM (GMT-05:00)
To: [redacted] @nisd.uscourts.gov
Cc: [redacted] @bop.gov>
Subject: Re: Jeffrey Epstein 19 cr 490
[redacted] 08/12/2019 14:44 >>>
Dear Judge Berman,
I will be happy to do so. Please let me know if I can be of further assistance.
Thank you,
[redacted]
Supervisory Staff Attorney
CLC New York
Metropolitan Correctional Center
150 Park Row
New York, New York 10007
p: (646)836-[redacted]
f: (646)836-7665
[redacted] @nisd.uscourts.gov 8/12/2019 2:42 >>>
[redacted] please thank the Warden for his prompt response to my letter.
Richard M. Berman
On Aug 12, 2019, at 2:37 PM, Christine Murray [redacted] @nysd.uscourts.gov> wrote:
fyi

To: "Lamine N'Diaye" [redacted] @bop.gov>, <BermanNYSDChambers@nysd.uscourts.gov>

Subject: Re: Jeffrey Epstein 19 cr 490
Good afternoon,

additional_notes: The document is an email chain with redactions. The content is related to Jeffrey Epstein's case (19 cr 490). The emails are exchanged between various individuals, including James Petrucci, Lee Plourde, and Christine Murray, and involve discussions about the case and interactions with Judge Berman.
